name: Canadian Tire
address: Canadian Tire, 3500 No. 3 Rd, Richmond, BC V6X 2C1

featured_reviews.review_id:
They damaged my box!!! And insulting staff!!!
I bought this and tried to return it. The staff said that once it's been used, I can't return it. I brought the box to the store and put everything back (just as in the original package). However, after they checked my item, they returned to me with this ruined package!!! And the staff are rude too. They said they have no time for this!! Very very disappointed!!!!!
featured_reviews.review_text:
They damaged my box!!! And insulting staff!!!
I bought this and tried to return it. The staff said that once it's been used, I can't return it. I brought the box to the store and put everything back (just as in the original package). However, after they checked my item, they returned to me with this ruined package!!! And the staff are rude too. They said they have no time for this!! Very very disappointed!!!!!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your review, Elaine. We appreciate your feedback. If you'd like to speak with someone from our customer service team about your experience, please call 1-800-387-8803. Thank you.

Corporate Customer Experience Team

featured_reviews.review_id:
I was very impressed with how helpful and polite all the employees from cashiers to floor staff. Been a long time since I've been in a store where the staff knew where the items I needed were and even guided me to the products. One item didn't have the measurements I was looking for and they offered to phone the  manufacture to get the details. After a bad experience with other store in richmond, this will be my go to
from now on. Thank you for your excellent customer service.
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.review_id: A smaller store but it seems quite tidy and organized.  The Christmas decorations are slowly taking over the shelves so they look a little bare at the moment.  You can find most emergency supplies here.  Make sure to check their website first to see if they have it in stock so you can save yourself a trip.
featured_reviews.review_text: A smaller store but it seems quite tidy and organized.  The Christmas decorations are slowly taking over the shelves so they look a little bare at the moment.  You can find most emergency supplies here.  Make sure to check their website first to see if they have it in stock so you can save yourself a trip.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thank you for taking the time to rate our store. We hope your next visit is a 4 or 5-star one!

Corporate Customer Experience Team

featured_reviews.review_id: The worst experience I have ever had! I came to change new tires, and they put a set of 4-year-old tires on my car. I have been told I can not leave if I want my refund until they put back my old tires. I came at 1pm, now it's 5pm and still need another 1 hour and half to get the job done. And the mamager is super rude, I will never ever come back again!
featured_reviews.review_text: The worst experience I have ever had! I came to change new tires, and they put a set of 4-year-old tires on my car. I have been told I can not leave if I want my refund until they put back my old tires. I came at 1pm, now it's 5pm and still need another 1 hour and half to get the job done. featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi there, your comment and experience are very important to us. Please feel free to call our customer service number at 1-800-387-8803 so we can help you further.

Corporate Customer Experience Team

featured_reviews.review_id: Just came here today. While waiting in the service department. I saw a service advisor named Leo talking to a customer and he was so rude. I am third in line and both of the customer before me got treated badly. When it's my turn. I was treated the same way also. I was just inquiring about a tire and he was being rude to me also. It put me in a bad mood today. Hopefully this guy changed his behavior towards his customer. I am a former employee of this branch under peter house ownership. If nothing can be done the next time I will be treated rudely I will go early in the morning just to talk to the owner now while they are having a morning huddle.

Corporate Customer Experience Team

featured_reviews.review_id: I had a great experience at Canadian Tire! The staff was incredibly helpful, and the atmosphere was welcoming. The positive attitude of the staff made my visit enjoyable, and I appreciate the excellent customer service.
featured_reviews.review_text: I had a great experience at Canadian Tire! The staff was incredibly helpful, and the atmosphere was welcoming. The positive attitude of the staff made my visit enjoyable, and I appreciate the excellent customer service.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thanks, Farid, we really appreciate the 5 stars! See you soon!

Corporate Customer Experience Team

featured_reviews.review_id: They don't honor booked appointments. Got there 15min before my appt - on time. Then heard from the responsible on duty - "Oh I left you a voice mail because this appt wont work for us". Worst costumer service experience.
featured_reviews.review_text: They don't honor booked appointments. Got there 15min before my appt - on time. Then heard from the responsible on duty - "Oh I left you a voice mail because this appt wont work for us". Worst costumer service experience.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi Felipe, we'd like to learn more about your experience with us. Can you please give us a call at 1-800-387-8803? Thank you.

Corporate Customer Experience Team

featured_reviews.review_id: Canadian Tire in Richmond, BC, is a reliable go-to for all your household and outdoor needs. This store has a wide selection of products, from automotive supplies to home improvement tools, making it a versatile one-stop shop. The knowledgeable staff members are always ready to assist and provide helpful recommendations. The well-organized aisles and clear signage make navigation easy, ensuring a convenient shopping experience. Whether you're tackling a DIY project, stocking up on outdoor gear, or simply browsing for home essentials, Canadian Tire in Richmond has you covered. It's a trusted destination for quality products and friendly service.
